name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
description: After the character to which this is attached receives healing from a source other than an Artifact: Heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP (Twice per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached receives healing from a source other than an Artifact:</color> Heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP (Twice per Round)
